THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.visual_reinforcement_of_title: The thumbnail strongly reinforces the title; it shows a speaker gesturing toward a brain illustration with the main text ('How to hack your brain when you’re in pain') overlaid, visually driving home the literal idea of understanding and altering brain functions to manage pain.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.contrasts_or_mismatches: No major mismatches; both the title and the thumbnail focus on the brain and self-help/intervention for pain, with the TED brand signaling authority and high production value.
